magpie.data.materials.util

Class GCLPCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.materials.util.GCLPCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GCLPCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Grand-Canonical Linear Programming (GCLP) method to compute phase equilibria.

    How to use this class:

    1. Load in phase equilibria data with addPhase(magpie.data.materials.CompositionEntry, double), setMu(java.lang.String, double), or addPhases(magpie.data.materials.CompositionDataset).
    2. Compute equilibrium with runGCLP(magpie.data.materials.CompositionEntry)
    3. Access ground state energy with #getGroundStateEnergy() and equilibrium with #getPhaseEquilibria()

    Reference: Akbarzadeh, Ozolins, Wolverton. Advanced Materials. 19 (2007), 3233.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
